title: Nissan Motor Co., Ltd.
description: Nissan Motor Co., Ltd. utilizes a sleek and modern color palette consisting of pure white (#FFFFFF), deep black (#000000), vibrant red (#C3002F), and a soft grey (#EFEFEF). This combination reflects both the brand's commitment to quality and innovation, as well as its elegant aesthetic. These colors are officially outlined on their brand foundation page, confirming their importance in maintaining brand consistency and recognition globally.
